notification.name: interfaceDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted. %asset[systemlocation]% until this outage is resolved.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% down.

notification.name: nodeLostService
notification.text-message: The %service% service poll on interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% failed at %time%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %service% down on %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: nodeAdded
notification.text-message: OpenNMS has discovered a new node named %parm[nodelabel]%. Please be advised.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %parm[nodelabel]% discovered.

notification.name: nodeDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on node %nodelabel%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved. %asset[systemlocation]%, %asset[room]%
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: node %nodelabel% down.

notification.name: interfaceDeleted
notification.text-message: Due to extended downtime or operator action, the interface %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% has been deleted from OpenNMS's polling database.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: [OpenNMS] %interfaceresolve% (%interface%) on node %nodelabel% deleted.

notification.name: High Threshold
notification.description: A monitored device has hit a high threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has been exceeded on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% while the threshold is %parm[threshold]%. This alert will be rearmed when %parm[ds]% reaches %parm[rearm]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: High Threshold for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Low Threshold
notification.description: A monitored device has hit a low threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has been exceeded on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% while the threshold is %parm[threshold]%. This alert will be rearmed when %parm[ds]% reaches %parm[rearm]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Low Threshold for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: High Threshold Rearmed
notification.description: A monitored device has recovered from a high threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has returned to normal on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% with a rearm threshold of %parm[rearm]%. This threshold for this alert was %parm[threshold]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: High Threshold Rearmed for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: Low Threshold Rearmed
notification.description: A monitored device has recovered from a low threshold
notification.text-message: A Threshold has returned to normal on node: %nodelabel%, interface:%interface%. The parameter %parm[ds]% reached a value of %parm[value]% with a rearm threshold of %parm[rearm]%. This threshold for this alert was %parm[threshold]%.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: High Threshold Rearmed for %parm[ds]% on node %nodelabel%.

notification.name: GLS: Used Partition size over 95 percent-eMail
notification.description: The used partition size is over 95 %
notification.text-message: The partition %parm[label]% on system %nodelabel% is used more than 95% of disk space. Please reduce usage down to 85%.
notification.subject: [Warning] #%noticeid% - %nodelabel%: Partition %parm[label]% over 95%

notification.name: GLS: Vodafone IPSec Tunnel inaktiv
notification.description: Vodafone M2M VPN IPSec Tunnel ist inaktiv
notification.text-message: Der IPSec Tunnel der VFM2M Verbindung ist inaktiv
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: ACHTUNG: VFM2M IPSec Tunnel inaktiv! node: %nodelabel%

notification.name: GLS: Vodafone M2M Low Threshold
notification.description: Vodafone M2M VPN Verbindung ist down
notification.text-message: Die Bandbreite der VFM2M Verbindung ist auf dem Interface %parm[ifIpAddress]% der node %nodelabel% unter 50 kbit/s. Der Alarm wird wieder aufgehoben, wenn die Bandbreite 100 kb it/s uebersteigt.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: ACHTUNG: VFM2M Bandbreite auf Interface %parm[ifIpAddress]% unter 50 kbit/s, node: %nodelabel%

notification.name: GLS: Vodafone M2M Low Threshold rearmed
notification.description: Vodafone M2M VPN Verbindung ist wieder da
notification.text-message: Die Bandbreite der VFM2M Verbindung ist auf dem Interface %parm[ifIpAddress]% der node %nodelabel% wieder ueber 100 kbit/s. Der Alarm fuer den Warnschwellenwert von 50 kbit/s ist aufgehoben.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Bandbreite VFM2M auf Interface %parm[ifIpAddress]% wieder ueber 100 kbit/s, node: %nodelabel%

notification.name: GLS: de-it-sued-bayer nodeDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on node %nodelabel%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: node %nodelabel% down.
